entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
